fullplot: Two 9-year-old boys, Jontti and Lènki, grow up in a Finnish seaside town in the 1960s. Lènki's biggest dream is to run away on a ship to the sea where his father is rumoured to have died. Jontti too must discover that his father is not what he appears to be. When his dad moves away with another woman, Jontti is determined to win him back.

title: Sokkotanssi
